author: Special Correspondent
text:
Two farmers were killed in a road accident near Orathanad in Thanjavur district on Tuesday night.

Police said that a speeding car from Madukkur to Vallam hit Mathiazhagan (40) of Aazhivaikkal Therkku Natham village and Ondhu (36) of Panjanadhikkottai who were standing on the roadside after irrigating their fields at Natham just past midnight.

After hitting them the car ran into a roadside tree injuring all its occupants.

The driver escaped under the cover of darkness and a manhunt has been launched for him.

Orathanad police rushed to the spot, recovered the bodies of the victims and sent them to the Thanjavur Medical College Hospital and are investigating.
title: Two farmers die in road accident near Orathanad
